DialogueDictionary.Balagas: yep... this sure is one big bal: 巴拉加斯：没错...这确实是个大气球。不过别动太快，不然很难找回中心位置。
DialogueDictionary.this moon might be one that contributes: 这颗卫星可能是岩浆星潮汐力的主要来源。至于是什么气体...反正不是能呼吸的就对了。
DialogueDictionary.speaking of gas, how'd this moon accumul: 说到气体，这么小的核心是怎么聚集这么多气体的？
DialogueDictionary.I've met you in multiple places far from: 我在很远的地方都见过你。
DialogueDictionary.there's lighting glitches with Slag and: 矿渣星和宜居星有光照问题
DialogueDictionary.do you think Soaring Boulder is the thin: 你觉得飞石就是撞上宜居星的那个东西吗？
DialogueDictionary.i found and read all the recorders!: 我找到并读完了所有记录仪！
DialogueDictionary.Huh? What do you mean? Aren’t the sights: 嗯？你什么意思？看看风景还不够吗？
DialogueDictionary.Well, wouldn’t a good mod have a win con: 好的模组不该有个胜利条件吗？
DialogueDictionary.Well it’s not like this mod is winning a: 虽然这模组赢不了比赛...但你说得对。
DialogueDictionary.Hm… tell you what, let’s make a deal. I’: 这样吧，我在每个卫星都留了笔记，你去找来读完，我就给你胜利奖励，如何？
DialogueDictionary.worst part is i don't even know what cau: 最糟的是我连原因都不知道，更别说修复了。OW模组社区也没辙。
DialogueDictionary.... you know what that would explain why: ...这倒解释了它为什么有引力，密度够大才能幸存。
DialogueDictionary.i just hope that throwing it into orbit: 希望把它扔进轨道不算破坏公物...
DialogueDictionary.great! i hope you could wait a sec becau: 太好了！稍等一下，我要感谢一些人
DialogueDictionary.first, a special thank you to GameWyrm f: 特别感谢GameWyrm帮忙解决影响普通玩家的致命bug，还介绍了超棒的工具！
DialogueDictionary.thank you to Vambok, solec, Trifid, Mega: 感谢Vambok、solec等人指导我处理MXL等问题，他们自己也在做参赛作品却抽空帮我，太暖心了！
DialogueDictionary.and thank you to braindead enthusiast fo: 感谢braindead enthusiast的鼓励，祝你好运！
DialogueDictionary.if you can attest to helping me and were: 如果被遗漏的协助者，我深表歉意并同样感谢！
DialogueDictionary.oh right. here, just stand infront of me: 哦对，来我面前好给你颁奖，这个角度太别扭了
DialogueDictionary.Homely Body: a moon within MagMag's habi: 宜居星：位于岩浆星宜居带的卫星，特征是对立的湖泊和山脉。
DialogueDictionary.i have a theory, maybe something hit thi: 我猜可能是撞击把物质都推到另一侧形成了山，而非散落各处。
DialogueDictionary....so yeah, i think that's all i wanted: ...就这些。现在怎么关掉这玩意儿...
DialogueDictionary.*shuffle* NO! *splash* (gargled) i am go: *挣扎声* 不！*落水声* (含糊) 我要骂人了！
DialogueDictionary.MagMag: aka what's currently death stari: 岩浆星：这个直勾勾瞪着我的流氓熔岩行星，热得能当卫星的太阳。
DialogueDictionary.this heat is kept alive by the tidal for: 卫星的潮汐力搅动表面产生摩擦热。讽刺的是卫星间却互不影响！怪哉..
DialogueDictionary.by the looks of it this process could ou: 这热度比恒星还持久！不过除非所有恒星都濒死，否则没啥用。
DialogueDictionary.like imagine how unlucky you'd have to b: 想想得多倒霉才能刚好见证宇宙灭亡！太惨了！(LoL)
DialogueDictionary.miny: the icey outer-most moon that also: 迷你星：最外侧的冰卫星，也是岩浆星环的牧羊卫星，两侧积累了碎屑形成独特形状。
DialogueDictionary.this moon being the farthest kinda remin: 这让我想起小行星带里那些远离恒星的矮行星。
DialogueDictionary.it's actually pretty cool seeing the rin: 从这里看星环超酷，特别是在迷你星上穿越环的时候。
DialogueDictionary.side note: unless you have something to: 注意：没降落手段就别在这跳。
DialogueDictionary.soaring Boulder: so when i came back to: 飞石：我弄丢第一个记录仪后，在岸边发现了这块大石头。
DialogueDictionary.i noticed that i could move it with a go: 借着低重力我把它滚上山（就像西西弗斯那样），然后扔进轨道图个乐子。
DialogueDictionary.so as it turns out this not a naturally: 结果这根本不是天然卫星的卫星，就是个普通石头。
DialogueDictionary.though side note about that lake; i swea: 顺便说那个湖...我发誓看到里面有东西，所以打死也不回去找记录仪了。
DialogueDictionary.alright now to place it there so any vis: 现在把它放这儿供访客学习。我在同一座山等飞石转回来就行。
DialogueDictionary.Oh! there it is! alright... *whoosh*...*: 哦！来了！...*嗖*...*啪嗒声伴着远处欢呼*
DialogueDictionary.Slag: is a small moon or rather a cluste: 矿渣星：说是卫星，其实是被潮汐力撕碎的同一颗卫星的碎片群。
DialogueDictionary.these chunks are currently orbiting in t: 这些碎片居然在岩浆星最外层大气轨道上！怎么还没烧没真是奇迹。
DialogueDictionary.and knowing that makes me being here eve: 知道这点还来真是蠢爆了！现在要记录岩浆星数据，得去碎片底部。
DialogueDictionary.yes that's stupid but i can't visit MagM: 对很蠢，但总比“试试站在熔岩上”那种蠢强。
DialogueDictionary.The mod you’re about to see doesn’t have: 这个模组没有宏大故事...
DialogueDictionary.but what it DOES have is lots of funny l: 但有很多有趣的小卫星！想看吗？
DialogueDictionary.great! see you there! Just make sure you: 太好了！记得开飞船进黑洞，别走进去！
DialogueDictionary.sounds horrible out of context but o-kay: 断章取义听起来好可怕...行吧！
DialogueDictionary.but by choosing to download this mod you: 但下载模组就说明你想玩啊

ShipLogDictionary.I found and read the recorder for Balaga: 我在巴拉加斯的核心处找到并阅读了记录仪！
ShipLogDictionary.I found and read the recorder for Homely: 我在宜居星的湖泊中找到并阅读了记录仪！
ShipLogDictionary.i completed APOLLO's task and he handed: 我完成了APOLLO的任务，他给了我奖励！是一张CGI奖杯图片，上面写着“你是赢家！”
ShipLogDictionary.I found and read the recorder for Miny!: 我找到并阅读了迷你星的记录仪！
ShipLogDictionary.I found and read the recorder for MagMag: 我在矿渣星底部找到并阅读了岩浆星的记录仪，差点死掉！
ShipLogDictionary.I found and read the recorder for Slag!: 我找到并阅读了矿渣星的记录仪！
ShipLogDictionary.I found and read the recorder for Soarin: 我找到并阅读了飞石的记录仪！
